body:
closes #16526

This is a rebased version of #16526 where commits have been factored to reflect functional changes:

- 9ce78be Has all the changes related to the new `packages.yaml` format and the configuration updates needed to support the conversion from the old format to the new one
- e5c689c Contains the simplifications / extensions to the detection protocol for external packages

This is in preparation for a "rebase and merge" rather than a single squashed commit. Thanks to @scheibelp for the extensive review in #16526 and help writing the detailed commit messages in this PR.
title: New format for packages.yaml, simplify detection protocol
